ygData.subject: Too many off-topic posts regarding server/guild politics
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t think posts of this nature are appropriate on this forum. This is a discussion group relating to bard issues, not guild/server politics. Although it s
ygData.messageBody:
I don't think posts of this nature are appropriate on this forum. This
is a discussion group relating to bard issues, not guild/server
politics. Although it's great to exchange thoughts on dragon raids, I
feel discussing politics pertaining to Innoruk/Veeshan, who is a KSer,
etc. aren't what eqbards is about. I only point this out because I
logged onto my e-mail this evening and received 191 e-mails since
yesterday evening, and the majority seem to be complaints about some
guild on Innoruk.

Please keep discussions relating to the Bard class. If you feel a need
to discuss server politics, EQ Vault hosts a very nice series of
server-specific boards where issues of this nature may be addressed.

Ariell Thunderwolf, Karana

Example:

Re: [eqbards] Cazic Thule slain on Innoruuk.

> Hehehe wow someone who knows who FoH is. I play on Veeshan with a lvl 50
> necro and run in to them ks'ng me all the time on big events. My guild and a
> few others got so sick of it we are banding together. Now FoH posted a
> message on Sony's message board about how there are so many high lvls on the
> servers that there need to be more planes and more dragons and what not
> cause there is going to be lots of KS'ng and fighting over spawns and what
> not. Man someone finally gets the player base to stand up to them and they
> run whimpering with there tails between their legs. Pay back's a bi**h.
> Anyways been lurking for a couple days getting ideas just started a twink
> bard and got it up to lvl 7.
